ref.mixed-citation: U.S. Congress House Committee on Small Business, Subcommittee on Energy, Environment, Safety and Research, Role of Government Funding and Its Impact on Small Businesses in the Solar Energy Industry: Hearings Before the Subcommittee on Energy, Environment, Safety, and Research of the Committee on Small Business, House of Representatives, Ninety-sixth Congress, First Session (U.S. Government Printing Office, 1980).
